sqlMap.select: select idx,writerId, subject,content, time,hitcount,recommendcount from c_healthz order by idx asc Limit #startArticleNum#, #endArticleNum#
select count(idx) from c_healthz where $type$ like '%$keyword$%'
select idx,writerId, subject,content, time,hitcount,recommendcount from c_healthz where $type$ like '%$keyword$%' order by idx asc Limit #startArticleNum#, #endArticleNum#
select idx, writerId, subject, content, img, fileupload, time, hitcount, recommendcount from c_healthz where idx = #idx#
select idx, writerId, time, content, linkedArticleNum from C_H_COMMENT where linkedArticleNum = #idx# order by idx desc
select idx, WriterId, time, content, linkedArticleNum from C_H_COMMENT where idx = #idx#
sqlMap.insert: insert into c_healthz(idx, writerId, subject, content, img,fileupload,time,hitcount, recommendcount) values(idx, #writerId#, #subject#, #content#, '', '', date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),0,0)
sqlMap.update: update c_healthz set hitcount = #hitcount# where idx = #idx#
update c_healthz set recommendcount = #recommendcount# where idx = #idx#
update c_healthz set subject = #subject#, content = #content# where idx = #idx#
